item.title: Python Review
item.description: What is this Document - This document is to get someone who knows how to program up to speed with python. It may also help compare languages. Tooling using the system python is mostly a trap pip is the package manager pyenv is a common installer/interpreter manager but there are others virtualenvs are a another name for a separate interpreter environment Basic Notes Scope is defined by indentation level, no brackets.
